=== Introduction ===

The team is responsible for developing, improving, managing and maintaining the Ubuntu Malaysia LoCo web (website, forum, planet, wiki, etc) contents.

Ubuntu Malaysia Web Team on launchpad https://edge.launchpad.net/~ubuntu-my-webteam
